movies.title: Dios los cría
movies.plot: Vicente ( Vicente Fernandez ) is on a business trip to Tijjuana from Guadalajara when he sees Lorenzo ( Lorenzo de Monteclaro), who is on his way to Guadalajara to receive an inheritance, stranded on the road and decides to help him. Vicente take Lorenzo to the nearest town and drops him off. Vicente goes to a bar to have a few drinks when a drunk pick a fight with him. Vicente is about to get shot when by chance Lorenzo walks into the bar and shoots the drunk guy in the arm saving Vicente's life. In return for saving Vicente's life Lorenzo asks Vicente to act as his fake blind brother Leucadio so Lorenzo can get his inheritance, ( Lorenzo made up a blind brother so he could get a bigger allowance from the tough executor of the inheritance and now both have to show up in order for Lorenzo to get the Inheritance) Vicente reluctantly agrees. When they arrive on Lorenzo's family ranch to their surprise the tough executor is a beautiful woman named Lupe. Both start to compete for her ...
movies.simplePlot: Vicente ( Vicente Fernandez ) is on a business trip to Tijjuana from Guadalajara when he sees Lorenzo ( Lorenzo de Monteclaro), who is on his way to Guadalajara to receive an inheritance, ...

biography.bio: Vicente Fernández was born on February 17, 1940 in Huentitan el Alto, Jalisco, Mexico as Vicente Fernandez Gomez. He is an actor and producer, known for El arracadas (1978), Como México no hay dos (1981) and Por tu maldito amor (1990). He has been married to Maria del Refugio Abarca Villaseñor since December 27, 1963. They have three children.
biography.name: Vicente Fernández

biography.bio: Lorenzo de Monteclaro is an actor, known for San Juan de Dios es Jalisco (1982), Caballo alazán lucero (1981) and Dios los cría (1977).
biography.name: Lorenzo de Monteclaro

biography.bio: Alicia Encinas is an actress, known for Distilling Love (2007), Italian Bride (2014) and The Bees (1978).
biography.name: Alicia Encinas

biography.bio: Mónica Prado is an actress and writer, known for La pistolera (1979), El futbolista fenómeno (1979) and Visita al pasado (1981).
biography.name: Mónica Prado

biography.bio: Carlos Riquelme studied law and philosophy, but turned to acting and made his stage debut in the mid-1930s. His first screen appearance followed in 1938. Riquelme's meek looks somewhat typecast him as clerks and doctors in his earlier pictures, but from time to time he was given change-of-pace roles, such as the mad doctor in The Body Snatcher (1957). Later he would specialize in mildly distracted, fey but generally sympathetic parts. He appeared in a number of international productions such as Au-dessous du volcan (1984) and The Milagro Beanfield War (1988), and also did considerable TV dubbing and radio work. He received a Best Actor Ariel nomination for En la tormenta (1982) and a nomination as Best Suppporting Actor for El joven Juárez (1954).
biography.name: Carlos Riquelme

biography.bio: María Salomé was born on January 27, 1915. She is an actress, known for The Castle of Mummies of Guanajuato (1973), Dios los cría (1977) and El hijo del pueblo (1974).
biography.name: María Salomé

biography.bio: Alberto Inzúa was born on September 24, 1926 in Havana, Cuba. He was an actor, known for Marisol (1996), Santo contre l'esprit du mal (1961) and No tienes derecho a juzgarme (1979). He died on April 14, 2003 in Mexico City, Mexico.
biography.name: Alberto Inzúa

biography.bio: Anaís de Melo is an actress, known for Caveman (1981), Los pequeños privilegios (1978) and Una rata en la oscuridad (1979).
biography.name: Anaís de Melo

biography.bio: Ana María Lo Polito worked as singer and TV hostess in Panama, before relocating in the 1960s to Mexico where she appeared in films, theater and cabarets. She had a special flair for comedy, working with top Mexican stars as César Costa and Gaspar Henaine, better known as "Capulina". Her cousin, playwright 'Édgar Soberón Torchia', wrote a musical comedy based freely on her life, "¡Yo quiero ser artista!", which won the Panamanian national literary prize.
biography.name: Ana María de Panamá

biography.bio: Álvaro Curiel was born on September 10, 1973 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico as Álvaro Curiel de Icaza. He is a director and assistant director, known for Acorazado (2010), El Santos vs la Tetona Mendoza (2012) and Si un instante (2003).
biography.name: Álvaro Curiel
